changesetID.description: The 40 char hex ID of the changeset. See https://www.mercurial-scm.org/wiki/ChangeSetID.

diffstat.description: Statistics about files changed by this changeset.  Similar to running 'hg diff --stat'.  May be null if diffstats were not computed.

additions.description: The number of lines added by this changeset.

changedFiles.description: The number of files modified by this changeset.

deletions.description: The number of lines removed by this changeset.

landingSystem.description: A string labelling the automated system used to land this changeset in this repository.  May be empty.

reviewSystemUsed.description: A string labelling the code review system used to review this changeset.  Possible values include (but are not limited to): 'mozreview', 'phabricator', 'bmo', 'unknown', and 'not_applicable'.

repository.description: The URL of the repository the changeset was pushed to.

pushDate.description: Timestamp, in Unix time (seconds since the Unix epoch), of when the push to the repository occurred.  This value is obtained from the original repository pushlog.
